resources.string: Hello world from the home fragment
This is a cool search page
Eventually you log your stuff here
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

E-Waste Management Information: 
 	 Many bluetooth devices can be taken in to the nearest 
 	 Best Buy. Other options involve donating them to a local 
 	 Goodwill and if they are no longer repairable, recycling 
 	 them. 
 Brand Average Lifespan: 
 1. Sony: 6-8 years 
 2. Bose: 6-8 years 
 3. Jabra: 3-4 years 
 4. Samsung: 3-5 years 
 5. Raycon: 4-6 years 
 Most Popular Bluetooth Brands: 
 1. Sony 
 2. Bose 
 3. Jabra 
 4. Samsung 
 5. Raycon

E-Waste Management Information: 
 	 Many gaming consoles can be taken in to the nearest 
 	 Best Buy. Other options involve donating them to a local 
 	 Goodwill and if they are no longer repairable, recycling 
 	 them. 
 Brand Average Lifespan: 
 1. Sony: 6-8 years 
 2. Microsoft: 6-8 years 
 3. Nintendo: 9-12 years 
 4. Fairchild: 3-5 years 
 5. Sega: 4-6 years 
 Most Popular Bluetooth Brands: 
 1. Sony 
 2. Microsoft 
 3. Nintendo 
 4. Fairchild 
 5. Sega

E-Waste Management Information: 
 	 Many smart phone devices can be taken in to the nearest 
 	 Best Buy. Other options involve donating them to a local 
 	 Goodwill and if they are no longer repairable, recycling 
 	 them. 
 Brand Average Lifespan: 
 1. Apple: 6-8 years 
 2. Google: 6-8 years 
 3. Android: 3-4 years 
 4. Samsung: 3-5 years 
 5. Nokia: 4-6 years 
 Most Popular Bluetooth Brands: 
 1. Apple 
 2. Google 
 3. Android 
 4. Samsung 
 5. Nokia

E-Waste Management Information: 
 	 Many smart watch devices can be taken in to the nearest 
 	 Best Buy. Other options involve donating them to a local 
 	 Goodwill and if they are no longer repairable, recycling 
 	 them. 
 Brand Average Lifespan: 
 1. Apple: 6-8 years 
 2. Samsung: 6-8 years 
 3. Fitbit: 3-4 years 
 4. Google: 3-5 years 
 5. Fossil: 4-6 years 
 Most Popular Bluetooth Brands:

E-Waste Management Information: 
 	 Many laptop devices can be taken in to the nearest 
 	 Best Buy. Other options involve donating them to a local 
 	 Goodwill or selling them. 
 Brand Average Lifespan: 
 1. Lenovo: 6-8 years 
 2. Dell: 6-8 years 
 3. Apple: 3-4 years 
 4. Microsoft: 3-5 years 
 5. HP: 4-6 years 
 Most Popular Bluetooth Brands: 
 1. Lenovo 
 2. Dell 
 3. Apple 
 4. Microsoft 
 5. HP

E-Waste Management Information: 
 	 Many lightbulbs can be taken in to the nearest 
 	 local recycling center. Other options involve donating 
 	 them to a local Goodwill, giving to a friend, or selling 
 	 them. 
 Brand Average Lifespan: 
 1. Bailey: 6-7 months 
 2. Bosma: 6-8 months 
 3. Bower: 3-4 months 
 4. Coast: 3-5 months 
 5. Culina: 4-6 months 
 Most Popular Bluetooth Brands: 
 1. Bailey 
 2. Bosma 
 3. Bower 
 4. Coast 
 5. Culina

E-Waste Management Information: 
 	 Many batteries can be taken in to the nearest 
 	 battery recycler. Other options involve taking them to the 
 	 local state solid waste authority 
 Brand Average Lifespan: 
 1. Energizer: 6-8 months 
 2. Duracell: 6-8 months 
 3. Crown: 3-4 months 
 4. Panasonic: 3-5 months 
 5. Optima: 4-6 months 
 Most Popular Bluetooth Brands: 
 1. Energizer 
 2. Duracell 
 3. Crown 
 4. Panasonic 
 5. Optima

E-Waste Management Information: 
 	 Many charging cables can be taken in to the nearest 
 	 local recycling center. Other options involve donating 
 	 them to a local Goodwill, giving to a friend, or selling 
 	 them. 
 Brand Average Lifespan: 
 1. Apple: 6-8 years 
 2. Android: 6-8 years 
 3. Cable Matters: 3-4 years 
 4. Amazon: 3-5 years 
 5. Lenovo: 4-6 years 
 Most Popular Bluetooth Brands: 
 1. Apple 
 2. Android 
 3. Cable Matters 
 4. Amazon 
 5. Lenovo
